meanings.definition: A medication used to prevent or treat malaria.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed mefloquine to protect me from malaria.
meanings.sent2: She took mefloquine before traveling to a tropical country.
meanings.sent3: The mefloquine pills were like tiny shields against the malaria-carrying mosquitoes.
meanings.sent4: Mefloquine was the hero in the battle against the malaria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange color of the mefloquine pills made them easy to remember to take.

meanings.definition: To administer mefloquine to prevent malaria.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will mefloquine the travelers before their trip.
meanings.sent2: He mefloquined the entire group to ensure they stayed healthy.
meanings.sent3: The camp counselor jokingly mefloquined the kids with pretend pills.
meanings.sent4: She mefloquined the area with mosquito repellent to keep them away.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully mefloquined the lab rats to study the effects on malaria prevention.
